alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 10:27PM MST until July 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 1100 PM MST. * At 1026 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Piestewa Peak Park, or over Paradise Valley, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Tempe, El Mirage, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Youngtown, Sun City, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, and Piestewa Peak Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 140 and 155. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 196, and between mile markers 200 and 222. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
